articles.title: Ikea’s new low-cost line is a huge win for Matter and your smart home - The Verge
articles.description: The furniture giant is launching 21 low-cost Matter-over-Thread sensors, light bulbs, buttons, and more.

articles.title: GTA 6 Studio Rockstar Accuses Fired Employees of Leaking 'Confidential Information in a Public Forum' - IGN
articles.description: GTA 6 studio Rockstar Games has accused the employees it recently fired of leaking confidential information.

articles.title: Canon adds a 32-megapixel sensor and 7K video to the new EOS R6 Mark III - The Verge
articles.description: The Canon EOS R6 Mark III features a new 32.5-megapixel full-frame sensor and 7K video recording. Announcing alongside it, Canon has a new RF 45mm f/1.2 STM lens coming.
